page.title: 13LIFE STYLES
page.content: My life in Edington by Clare Millar. I am seven years old. I get up at 7a.m. and have corn flakes with sugar and milk, toast and a cup of tea for breakfast. I wash and get myself dressed,mummy does my hair then brings me to school at 9.o clock. The lollipop lady sees us across the busy road. In school we have stories about Jesus. Then we work. I like poems best. At playtime I play with my friends.Then we work till 12 o clock. I go home for lunch, returning at 1 o clock.Wednesdays we go swimming in Westbury.We finish school at 3.15pm. In my spare time, I go to Brownies,ballet classes,music lessons, and I like to play games with my brother Douglas who is four. My family has tea at 6 o clock then watches the news on t.v. I go to bed at 7 o clock.
